article_title: Verisk Analytics' Health Care Unit Could Fetch $1 Billion
article_text:
Will Verisk Analytics (VRSK) Stock Be Helped by Potential Healthcare Unit Sale?

Verisk Analytics (VRSK) stock is down on Friday morning, as Carlyle Group is said to be in the lead to purchase the company's healthcare unit.

article_metadata.description: Verisk Analytics (VRSK) has retained Morgan Stanley (MS) to sell its health care division. The unit, which posts ebitda of around $90 million, could be worth $900 million to $1.1 billion.
article_metadata.author: Laura Cooper
